00029 #ifndef _AP4_DESCRIPTOR_H_
00030 #define _AP4_DESCRIPTOR_H_
00031 
00032 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #include "Ap4Expandable.h"
00036 #include "Ap4List.h"
00037 
00038 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 |   class references
00040 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 class AP4_ByteStream;
00042 class AP4_AtomInspector;
00043 
00044 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 |   AP4_Descriptor
00046 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 class AP4_Descriptor : public AP4_Expandable
00048 {
00049  public:
00050     // constructor
00051     AP4_Descriptor(AP4_UI08 tag, AP4_Size header_size, AP4_Size payload_size) :
00052         AP4_Expandable(tag, CLASS_ID_SIZE_08, header_size, payload_size) {}
00053 
00054     // AP4_Exandable methods
00055     virtual AP4_Result Inspect(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00056 
00057     // methods
00058     AP4_UI08 GetTag() { return (AP4_UI08)m_ClassId; }
00059 };
00060 
00061 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 |   AP4_UnknownDescriptor
00063 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 class AP4_UnknownDescriptor : public AP4_Descriptor
00065 {
00066 public:
00067     // contrusctor
00068     AP4_UnknownDescriptor(AP4_ByteStream& stream, 
00069                           AP4_UI08        tag,
00070                           AP4_Size        header_size,
00071                           AP4_Size        payload_size);
00072                           
00073     // AP4_Expandable methods
00074     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00075     
00076 private:
00077     // members
00078     AP4_DataBuffer m_Data;
00079 };
00080 
00081 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 |   AP4_DescriptorFinder
00083 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 class AP4_DescriptorFinder : public AP4_List<AP4_Descriptor>::Item::Finder
00085 {
00086  public:
00087     AP4_DescriptorFinder(AP4_UI08 tag) : m_Tag(tag) {}
00088     AP4_Result Test(AP4_Descriptor* descriptor) const {
00089         return descriptor->GetTag() == m_Tag ? AP4_SUCCESS : AP4_FAILURE;
00090     }
00091  private:
00092     AP4_UI08 m_Tag;
00093 };
00094 
00095 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 |   AP4_DescriptorListWriter
00097 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 class AP4_DescriptorListWriter : public AP4_List<AP4_Descriptor>::Item::Operator
00099 {
00100 public:
00101     AP4_DescriptorListWriter(AP4_ByteStream& stream) :
00102       m_Stream(stream) {}
00103     AP4_Result Action(AP4_Descriptor* descriptor) const {
00104         return descriptor->Write(m_Stream);
00105     }
00106 
00107 private:
00108     AP4_ByteStream& m_Stream;
00109 };
00110 
00111 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 |   AP4_DescriptorListInspector
00113 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114 class AP4_DescriptorListInspector : public AP4_List<AP4_Descriptor>::Item::Operator
00115 {
00116  public:
00117     AP4_DescriptorListInspector(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector) :
00118         m_Inspector(inspector) {}
00119     AP4_Result Action(AP4_Descriptor* descriptor) const {
00120         descriptor->Inspect(m_Inspector);
00121         return AP4_SUCCESS;
00122     }
00123 
00124  private:
00125     AP4_AtomInspector& m_Inspector;
00126 };
